poem:
The Global Heartbeat

In the heart's knowledge,
threading continents—
wisdom blooms incandescent,
a chorus of lives unlived.

Between ink and chant,
the South's sun kisses
the frost of the North,
and scholars sway,
in a dance of
untold stories.
